text: Erendira is a genus of corinnid sac spiders first described by A. B. Bonaldo in 2000. ==Species== it contains five species: *Erendira atrox (Caporiacco, 1955) — Venezuela *Erendira luteomaculata (Petrunkevitch, 1925) — Panama *Erendira pallidoguttata (Simon, 1898) — Puerto Rico, Lesser Antilles *Erendira pictithorax (Caporiacco, 1955) — Venezuela *Erendira subsignata (Simon, 1898) — St. Vincent ==References== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Corinnidae
title: Erendira (spider)
